      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Story FileHelper.decodeStory(Story story, int mode)
      This function decodes a story's images files from encoded strings to byteArray and save them to local before passing the story to addOfflineStory(Story story) for adding to local
      Story FileHelper.encodeStory(Story s)
      Function takes in a story object and encodes all the image files related to the story into a Base64 string for further use.

      Retrieve the file by the passed story id, and get the file.
      Story ESHelper.getOnlineStory(int storyId)
      Returns a Story object for a specific onlineStoryId contained on the webservice.

      java.util.ArrayList<Story> ESHelper.searchOnlineStories(java.lang.String searchString)
      Returns a list of stories from the webservice that contain the searched text in either their Author or Title fields.
